document.full_text: a u.s. government agency took a step closer to blowing up a mississippi river levee to control flooding on saturday after a court decision cleared the way for it to proceed.
document.title: u.s. government moves closer to blowing up levee
lines_and_colors: a u.s. government agency took a step closer to blowing up a mississippi river levee to control flooding on saturday after a court decision cleared the way for it to proceed.
